channel.title: Help
channel.description:
how i talk to like a shop trader ?
and when i hit a lvl 120 i just need 1 hit than it die why??
i need a good help plz

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @Itachi_Uchiha Itachi Uchiha
item.description:
@Itachi_Uchiha wrote:

for the first questionâ€¦
go to your client.java folder and look for

} else if (NPCID == 553) { //Aubury rune shop

it should look like this

} else if (NPCID == 553) { //Aubury rune shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 2; //Aubury Magic Shop

now just copy and paste this

} else if (NPCID == 553) { //Aubury rune shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 2; //Aubury Magic Shop
and add the shop npcs # that you want to trade lol i think :\

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @catdaddy1yo catdaddy1yo
item.description:
@catdaddy1yo wrote:

idk about the fists one cuz im kinda now too but after 5 days i leared how to start my own server but anyway if u hit a 0 and they died its cuz u never set there health, go to npc if u c things like this
npc = 0 Hans 0 0
npc = 1 Man 2 7
npc = 2 Man 2 7
npc = 3 Man 2 7
its the right one, find the # of the enemy your killing and change the health from 0 to something else
